text: Se balala -- ''amake e-saba de'oya hayeche amara madhye ye jnana rayeche sejan'ya.â€™â€™ Se ki janata na ye tara age bahu manabagosthike allah dhbansa kare phelechena yara chila tara ceye'o saktite adhika prabala ebam ekattakarane aro pracuryamaya? Ara aparadhidera tadera papa sanbandhe prasna kara habe na.
